org.jgentleframework.context
Class ServiceProviderImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.context.injecting.AbstractLoadingFactory
      org.jgentleframework.context.injecting.AbstractBeanFactory
          org.jgentleframework.context.AbstractServiceManagement
              org.jgentleframework.context.ServiceProviderImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Context, IAbstractServiceManagement, IAbstractBeanFactory, Provider, ServiceProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
WebProvider
public class ServiceProviderImpl
extends AbstractServiceManagement
implements ServiceProvider

This class is an implementation of ServiceProvider interface. It's responsible for a container which manages all of services of system. Moreover, because of ServiceProvider is an extension of Provider so it has all features as same as an Provider.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
Provider, ServiceProvider
